name: Bunny Ghost
description:
This is an endless runner game I've made and the first time of my solo GameJam for the Gamedev.tv GameJam 2022.

For the source code, you can check my Github repository.

Can't expect to make this bug free. And the time limit doesn't let me polish the game more. But hopefully, you can enjoy it!

The Story A lost young rabbit trying to find his way to go home. But there are many obstacles that make it more difficult to survive his journey. Fortunately, he's been taught how to possess other being when he died. So, he could have a second chance at the cost of losing his original body. Can you help him on his journey to come home? My Resources
  • Quaternius (https://quaternius.com/)
  • Open Game Art (https://opengameart.org/)

Cheers,
Dovjay
